title: WTB: Looking for a T206 Cobb Bat Off w/Sweet Cap Back
author: christopher.herman

posts.post_title: WTB: Looking for a T206 Cobb Bat Off w/Sweet Cap Back
posts.post_content:
Hello fellow Net54'ers:
Please disregard. Got one.
As an Xmas gift to myself for being such a good boy this year, I am looking for a T206 Cobb Bat Off w/ a Sweet Caporal back only (any factory or district is fine --- an overprint would be great but not necessary) to add to my personal collection.
Show me what you got. 
Email (front and back) scans to mrbartell1 (at) aol.com
Thanks and Happy Holidays,
Chris.
